TopicTitle: Mod to put image on side of rocket?

Articles.Content: I remember a while ago there used to be a mod where you could get an image and place it on your vehicle.

There are a couple flag decals [http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/222813-flag-decals-v2-3](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/222813-flag-decals-v2-3) and NEBULA [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100984-0-25-NEBULA-space-engineering-Decals](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100984-0-25-NEBULA-space-engineering-Decals)!
